about_the_game:
Step into your new home, a ring transport station in a lawless system commonly called 'Isfetian Space' on the edge of Federation territory. Most people say running a warp gate station in Isfetian Space is too dangerous and won't be profitable, but you didn't listen!

The Federation doesn't care what happens on the galaxy's fringe, but a ship that wants to travel back into the safer core systems needs clean credentials. That's where you come in! Earn the trust of The Federation by sending ships that have cleared credentials, exposing counterfeit credentials, and reporting wanted individuals to the Federation Police. Send too many uncleared ships and you'll lose the trust of The Federation, and your access to the core systems, leaving you with a warp gate and nowhere to send ships!

Core mechanics:

  • Send ships through the warp gate to generate income

  • Maintain the station and keep it in tip-top shape

  • Collect resources to craft parts

  • Hack into a ship's computers to validate credentials and expose counterfeits

  • Place and send tracking data on flagged ships and report wanted individuals to collect bounties and gain Federation trust

  • Explore the asteroid field and uncover its secrets

name: Warp Gate Galactic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Validate credentials, provide travel, and collect bounties while maintaining your warp gate station on the dangerous fringe of the galaxy.
